# eslint/no-proto <Badge type="info" text="Restriction" />

<div class="rule-meta">
</div>

### What it does

Disallow the use of the **proto** property

### Why is this bad?

**proto** property has been deprecated as of ECMAScript 3.1 and shouldnâ€™t be used in the code. Use Object.getPrototypeOf and Object.setPrototypeOf instead.

### Example

```javascript
/*eslint no-proto: "error"*/

var a = obj.__proto__;

var a = obj["__proto__"];

obj.__proto__ = b;

obj["__proto__"] = b;
```
